description:
This course offers you information, best strategies, and practice exercises that will help you improve your test scores on Elance. With the use of informational videos, tutorials and screenshares, practice exams, points and other cool resources, this course trains serious freelancers on Elance Skills tests.

This course was made by Samaschool, a non-profit venture that provides workforce education for the digital economy. Start this course now and witness improvements on your test scores right away. Since its launch in 2013, Samaschool has trained over 330 people in urban and rural communities across the United States. Learn more by visiting our website.

Start this course now and witness improvements on your test scores right away.
title: Elance: Enhance Your Credentials
